text: int main ( ) { int ans ; int x , n , i , j , num ; scanf ( "%d" , & num ) ; while ( num -- ) { ans = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; x = n ; int arr [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < x ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { arr [ i ] [ j + 1 ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( i != 0 && j != 0 ) { if ( arr [ i - 1 ] [ j ] < arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) arr [ i ] [ j ] = arr [ i ] [ j ] + arr [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; else arr [ i ] [ j ] = arr [ i ] [ j ] + arr [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } if ( i != 0 && j == 0 ) { arr [ i ] [ j ] = arr [ i ] [ j ] + arr [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } if ( ans <= arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ans = arr [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , ans ) ; } }
